name: My name is Jazz
description:
Everyone has their dream. However, only a few fulfill it. 

They asked me what my dream was, and I said I wanted to be a music teacher.  I didn't make it but I live from music, at least. I have a good salary and a good apartment, I don't think I need more. But...I just had a new opportunity.  A new opportunity to fulfill it.

Twitter | Instagram | Discord 

My name is Jazz is a romantic and adventure visual novel. You'll be able, with total freedom, to meet and interact with characters. For now, it's under development.

You'll manage a man who had adolescence affected by a situation that occurred. Passionate about music, you decide to dedicate your working life to it, working for a representation agency, specifically for an important musical artist.

Everything is going well until you start to lose your boss's trust. From that moment, you must decide what to do with your life.

Features (so far)
  • Sandbox-style minigame
  • Multiple paths
  • Much more to come!
